metadata.description: Complete SDD software development lifecycle with spec-driven workflows, autonomous feature orchestration, quality validation, and performance monitoring.

plugins.name: specswarm
plugins.description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.2.0: NEW - Multi-language support (Python/PHP/Go/Ruby/Rust), README.md context reading, enhanced auto-detection. v3.1.0: Project init, rollback safety, security audits, release automation. Core features: 4 high-level commands (build/fix/upgrade/ship), 70% workflow simplification, full backward compatibility.
